basic.description:
Advanced seminar on specific area of research and study selected by the instructor. Subjects have included Québécois cinema, film and mass culture in Canada.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Canadian Cinema: Special Topic

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110) and 18.0 units in FILM.
